ITM 0
00000000
11011000
10101000

00111100
NAME tesco
DLG ITM_0

DLG SPR_0
blehhhhhhh { t01 = 1 }

DLG ITM_0
ooh a bag of bland goodies from tesco! perfect!

DLG SPR_1
you rinse your mouth out real well

DLG SPR_3
maybe you'll take a bath when you feel better?

DLG SPR_4
maybe you'll take a bath when you feel better?

DLG SPR_2
"""
g: oh no! you're sick!

g: don't worry, i'm here { g01 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_5
"""
z: oh no! sorry to hear that you're sick
z: do you need anything?

z: i bet you could use some aspirin and bland food
z: i'll bring you something from the tesco in a bit { z01 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_7
"""
nothing here

just a soft buzzing sound
"""

DLG SPR_8
the passports are safely tucked away

DLG SPR_b
"""
g: comfy? ready to continue the story?
g: last time our hero did some death magic
g: ..."the ghosts in his stomach were restless"...
g: ... "crows" ... "wandering" ... "turning..."
you: ....zzzzz.... { g03 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_c
"""
g: after you get ready for bed i'll read to you
g: we're getting to the good part! { g02 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_d
"""
...

are you going to throw up again?

...

no...? { t02 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_e
"""
*brush*

*brush*

*brush your teeth*
"""

DLG SPR_f
"""
z: how're you feeling?

z: g and i went out to tesco

z: we brought you some supplies! { z02 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_g
"""
there is some cold soya milk inside
cornflakes and digestive biscuits on top
*crunch*

*crunch*

it's okay
"""

DLG SPR_i
"""
g: you doing okay?

g: really? ready for a walk?

g: alright! { g05 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_j
g: to the vegan store we go! { g06 = 1 }

DLG SPR_k
"""
g: we found a vegan store while we were out
g: maybe when you feel better we can visit { g04 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_a
"""
your clothes are folded in your suitcase
you wish you felt ok to change out of your pjs
which is strange, you normally can't wait to get into pjs
"""

DLG SPR_9
"""
clothes are spilling out of g's bag
lovely warm sweaters and comfy scarves
"""

DLG SPR_6
"""
...

nothing?

yes!!! you feel better! { t03 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_h
"""
meow!

*purr*

*purrrr*
"""

DLG SPR_m
"""
s: um... sorry, you can't be back here
s: i know it smells nice
"""

DLG SPR_l
"""
s: what would you like today?

s: grilled cheese? you mean cheese toastie? can do!
s: our vegan cheese is really good, super gooey and yummy
s: and our bread is thick and toasts up golden brown
s: basically super delicious { s01 = 1 }
"""

DLG SPR_n
"""
g: what're you going to get?

g: grilled cheese? yum

g: hope it's really good!
"""

DLG SPR_o
"""
s: um... sorry, you can't be back here
s: i know it smells nice
"""

DLG SPR_p
"""
{
  - t01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-01,4,6")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_q
"""
ok this is {wvy}really good{wvy}

better take the rest to go {s02 = 1}
"""

DLG SPR_r
"""
{
  - g01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-02,11,6")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_s
"""
{
  - z01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-03,11,8")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_t
"""
{
  - g02 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-04,4,7")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_u
"""
{
  - g02 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-05,4,5")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_v
"""
{
  - t02 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-06,4,6")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_w
"""
{
  - g03 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-08,3,10")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_x
"""
{
  - z02 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-11,11,8")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_y
"""
{
  - g04 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-12,4,5")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_z
"""
{
  - t03 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-13,4,6")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_10
"""
{
  - g05 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-14,11,7")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_11
"""
{
  - g06 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-15,4,8")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_12
"""
{
  - s01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-20,8,7")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_13
"""
{
  - s01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-20,6,7")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_14
"""
{
  - s01 == 1 ?
    (exit "room-20,7,8")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_15
g: i know it's good, but don't push yourself

DLG SPR_16
"""
{
  - s02 == 1 ?
    (end "you take another bite of your delicious toastie               but you begin to feel the nausea returning                      ... oh no")
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_17
(exit "room-10,11,7")

END 0


VAR g01
0

VAR z01
0

VAR g02
0

VAR t01
0

VAR t02
0

VAR g03

VAR z02

VAR g04

VAR t03

VAR g05

VAR g06

VAR s01

VAR s02
